reports.label: No IANA considerations issues apparent in Section 7
reports.explanation: Section 7 clearly states that RFC 9844 does not define or modify any IANA-managed registries, and the analysis reflects that there are no IANA considerations issues present.
justification: The excerpt summary explains that Section 7 simply states that RFC 9844 has no IANA actions and does not modify IANA-managed registries (E1).
The candidate issue explicitly labels the issue as 'No IANA considerations issues apparent', supported by low ratings in all assessment dimensions (E2).

snippets.text: Excerpt Summary: Section 7 simply states that RFC 9844 has no IANA actions, i.e., it does not define or modify any IANA-managed registries. The rest of the document defines UI behavior for IPv6 zone identifiers and updates/obsoletes other RFCs purely at the specification-text level.

Candidate Issues: 1

  Issue 1:
    Type: None
    Label: No IANA considerations issues apparent
    Relevant Dimensions: 
    Sketch: Section 7 is a straightforward declaration that RFC 9844 does not create or modify any IANA registri...

summary: (E1) Section 7 states that RFC 9844 has no IANA actions and does not modify any IANA-managed registries.
(E2) The candidate issue indicates that there are no IANA considerations issues apparent, as described in the analysis sketch.

reports.severity_basis: All evaluation dimensions (Temporal, ActorDirectionality, Scope, etc.) are rated low, indicating that the lack of IANA actions does not pose any problematic behavior.
